Row.Text: Tier 1 Modern Ranged Unit. Stronger on attack than defense.
Tier 1 Modern Cavalry Unit. Ignores Zone of Control.
Tier 1 Modern Siege Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Tier 1 Modern Heavy Naval Unit. Cannot enter Navigable Rivers.
Tier 2 Modern Ranged Unit. Stronger on attack than defense.
Tier 2 Modern Cavalry Unit. Ignores Zone of Control.
Tier 2 Modern Siege Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Tier 2 Modern Heavy Naval Unit. Cannot enter Navigable Rivers.
Tier 2 Modern Fighter Air Unit. Can intercept enemy Air Units. Not very effective against Land or Naval Units.
Tier 2 Modern Ground Attack Air Unit. Strong against Land and Naval Units. Not very effective against Aircraft.
Tier 2 Modern Siege Air Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts at long range.
Tier 3 Modern Ranged Unit. Stronger on attack than defense.
Tier 3 Modern Cavalry Unit. Ignores Zone of Control.
Tier 3 Modern Siege Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Tier 3 Modern Heavy Naval Unit. Cannot enter Navigable Rivers.
Tier 3 Modern Stealth Naval Unit. Can only be seen by adjacent Units.
Tier 3 Modern Fighter Air Unit. Can intercept enemy Air Units. Not very effective against Land or Naval Units.
Tier 3 Modern Ground Attack Air Unit. Strong against Land and Naval Units. Not very effective against Aircraft.
Tier 3 Modern Siege Air Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts at long range.
Support Unit that finds and extracts [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifacts buried in an earlier Age.
American Unique Infantry Unit. Has the Amphibious ability. Cheaper to train.
Tier 2 American Unique Infantry Unit. Has the Amphibious ability. Cheaper to train.
Tier 3 American Unique Infantry Unit. Has the Amphibious ability. Cheaper to train.
American Unique Civilian Unit. Claims a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Land Resource outside of your regular Settlement radius.

Activate on an unowned [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Land Resource tile within 5 tiles of one of your Settlements' Palace or City Hall. A path of tiles is claimed back to the Settlement and the [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource is improved immediately.
Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 [icon:Action_Heal] HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging any tile.
Tier 1 Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 [icon:Action_Heal] HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging any tile.
Tier 2 Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 [icon:Action_Heal] HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging any tile.
Tier 3 Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 [icon:Action_Heal] HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging any tile.
Bugandan Unique Army Commander. +50% yield from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging within the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.

[icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to the other Yield or [icon:Action_Heal] Healing gained. Civilian and Support Units gain +3 [icon:Action_Move] Movement Speed while Embarked.

French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged attack. +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Army Commander. More expensive to train.

Tier 1 French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged attack. +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Army Commander. More expensive to train.

Tier 2 French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged attack. +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Army Commander. More expensive to train.

Tier 3 French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged attack. +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Army Commander. More expensive to train.
Meiji Japanese Unique Heavy Naval Unit. The first time this Unit is destroyed, it respawns in the closest Settlement you own at 50% [icon:Action_Heal] HP.
Tier 2 Meiji Japanese Unique Heavy Naval Unit. The first time this Unit is destroyed, it respawns in the closest Settlement you own at 50% [icon:Action_Heal] HP.
Tier 3 Meiji Japanese Unique Heavy Naval Unit. The first time this Unit is destroyed, it respawns in the closest Settlement you own at 50% [icon:Action_Heal] HP.
Meiji Japanese Unique Fighter Air Unit. Increased range. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against other Fighter Air Units. Can intercept enemy Air Units.
Tier 2 Meiji Japanese Unique Fighter Air Unit. Increased range. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against other Fighter Air Units. Can intercept enemy Air Units.
Tier 3 Meiji Japanese Unique Fighter Air Unit. Increased range. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against other Fighter Air Units. Can intercept enemy Air Units.
Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units gain +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing. Does not stack.
Tier 1 Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units gain +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing. Does not stack.
Tier 2 Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units gain +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing. Does not stack.
Tier 3 Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units gain +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing. Does not stack.
Mughal Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Bombard attack.
Tier 1 Mughal Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Bombard attack.
Tier 2 Mughal Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Bombard attack.
Tier 3 Mughal Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Bombard attack.
Ranged attack with +20 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.
Mughal Unique Settler. Civilian Unit capable of founding new [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. +1 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population on new [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Prussian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:Action_Move] Movement it has remaining.
Tier 1 Prussian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:Action_Move] Movement it has remaining.
Tier 2 Prussian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:Action_Move] Movement it has remaining.
Tier 3 Prussian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:Action_Move] Movement it has remaining.
Prussian Ground Attack Air Unit. +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Land Units.
Tier 2 Prussian Ground Attack Air Unit. +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Land Units.
Tier 3 Prussian Ground Attack Air Unit. +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Land Units.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units within the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius of a [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commander that has earned at least 1 Commendation.
Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength if adjacent to another [icon:UNIT_GUSA] Gusa.
Tier 1 Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength if adjacent to another [icon:UNIT_GUSA] Gusa.
Tier 2 Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength if adjacent to another [icon:UNIT_GUSA] Gusa.
Tier 3 Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength if adjacent to another [icon:UNIT_GUSA] Gusa.

Qing Unique Merchant. Civilian who can establish a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route to import [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources from a foreign Settlement. Gain 50 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource acquired when creating a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Naval Trade Route.
Russian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength in friendly territory.
Tier 1 Russian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength in friendly territory.
Tier 2 Russian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength in friendly territory.
Tier 3 Russian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength in friendly territory.

Russian Unique Siege Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Lower [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength but has the Splash ability, dealing [icon:DAMAGED] damage to enemy Units adjacent to the target Unit.

Tier 2 Russian Unique Siege Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Lower [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength but has the Splash ability, dealing [icon:DAMAGED] damage to enemy Units adjacent to the target Unit.

Tier 3 Russian Unique Siege Unit. Has +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Lower [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength but has the Splash ability, dealing [icon:DAMAGED] damage to enemy Units adjacent to the target Unit.
Siamese Unique Ranged Unit. Has increased [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Strength and +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Can move after attacking.
Tier 1 Siamese Unique Ranged Unit. Has increased [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Strength and +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Can move after attacking.
Tier 2 Siamese Unique Ranged Unit. Has increased [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Strength and +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Can move after attacking.
Tier 3 Siamese Unique Ranged Unit. Has increased [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Strength and +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. Can move after attacking.

City State Unique Infantry Unit. Each one is slightly more expensive than the last. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Civilizations with a different [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology. +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing in owned territory.
